title: VR Experience
description: Immerse yourself in virtual reality with our state-of-the-art VR headsets. Experience #1 features underwater exploration where you can swim with marine life and discover ocean depths.

title: VR Experience #2
description: Our second VR station takes you to outer space where you can explore planets, float among the stars, and experience zero gravity all from the safety of our booth.

title: VR Experience #3
description: Step into a virtual art studio where you can paint in 3D space, create sculptures out of light, and express your creativity without limits or mess.

title: VR Experience #4
description: Our adventure VR experience puts you in an ancient temple filled with puzzles and mysteries to solve. Work against the clock to escape the virtual temple!

title: Racing Simulator
description: Feel the rush of professional racing in our high-fidelity racing simulator. With force feedback wheels, professional pedals, and triple screens, you'll experience what it's like to race at speeds over 200mph.

title: Flight Simulator
description: Take control of a commercial aircraft and learn the basics of flight in our realistic cockpit simulator. Perfect for first-time pilots!

title: Flight Simulator #2
description: Experience combat flight simulation with realistic controls and immersive graphics. Put your piloting skills to the test in various challenging scenarios.

title: LP Robotics
description: Visit our robotics station to see demonstrations of student-built robots and try your hand at programming simple robot tasks. Learn about the basics of robotics and how to get started in this exciting field.

title: LP Laser Cutting
description: Watch our laser cutter in action and take home a custom-cut souvenir. Learn about the technology behind laser cutting and its applications in art, engineering, and manufacturing.

title: HPD Keiki ID
description: The Honolulu Police Department is offering free keiki (child) ID services. Get a digital fingerprint and photo ID card for your child - an important safety tool for families.

title: Hawaii Job Corps Center
description: Learn about career opportunities and training programs offered by the Hawaii Job Corps. Representatives will be available to discuss education pathways, job placement assistance, and answer questions about vocational training.

title: HPU Showcase
description: Hawaii Pacific University representatives will showcase their STEM programs, research initiatives, and interactive demonstrations. Learn about college pathways and scholarship opportunities.

title: Mobile IT Force/Lenovo Tech Station
description: Explore cutting-edge technology demonstrations. Try out the latest laptops, educational software, and innovative tech tools designed for learning and creativity.

title: Claw Machine/Arcade
description: Test your skills at our classic claw machine arcade game. Win prizes and experience the nostalgic joy of the arcade experience.

title: Claw Machine/Arcade 2
description: Another chance to test your skills at the claw machine arcade game with different prizes! Challenge friends and family to see who can grab the most prizes.

title: Looopsie Photobooth
description: Capture fun memories at our animated photobooth! The Looopsie photobooth creates short animated loops that bring your photos to life. Receive digital copies instantly to share on social media.

title: Petting Zoo
description: Get up close with friendly farm animals including rabbits, goats, sheep, and more! Pet, feed, and learn about these gentle creatures in our supervised petting zoo area.

title: Pony Rides
description: Take a gentle ride on our friendly ponies! Each child is led by an experienced handler around our safely enclosed riding area for a magical experience.

title: Bounce Houses
description: Jump, bounce and play in our collection of inflatable bounce houses! We have different themes and sizes suitable for various age groups.

title: Carnival-Style Games
description: Test your skills at classic carnival games! Try ring toss, balloon pop, ball throw, and more to win exciting prizes. Great for all skill levels.

title: Crafts
description: Express your creativity at our crafts station! Make personalized keepsakes, art projects, and take-home crafts with guidance from our helpful staff.
